short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Islamic prayer times based on your location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
9M2PJU Islamic Prayer Times is a simple and elegant Chrome extension that provides daily Islamic prayer times directly in your browser. Whether you’re at home or traveling, this extension uses your location to fetch the most accurate prayer times for your area.

If you enjoy using this extension and would like to support its development, consider buying me a coffee! https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/9m2pju

Key Features:

Accurate Prayer Times: Displays daily prayer times for Fajr, Dhuhr, Asr, Maghrib, and Isha, based on your precise geographic location.

Location-Based: Automatically detects your location via IP to provide prayer times without any manual input.

Beautiful Design: Each prayer time is highlighted in a unique soft color to differentiate the times, making it visually pleasing and easy to read.

Minimalist UI: The extension is designed with simplicity in mind—minimal clutter and a user-friendly interface.
Instant Access: Just click the extension icon to quickly view the prayer times without needing to open any additional apps or tabs.

For more info, visit https://hamradio.my
